attributes.action: Scrap parking charges and parking attendants
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Apparently we the public own the roads and have to pay for their upkeep yet we also have to pay to park on them. if they are ours why do we pay someone else?
There is not enough parking in city centres and personal transport is needed because public transport is inadequate.
we need parking charges in cities and towns to be scrapped.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
